author: Michael Yeatts
text:
Chesterfield County currently has a traditional leave program including annual and sick Leave.  We are currently exploring the option of converting to a Paid Time Off (PTO) leave program.  If your organization has gone through a similar process please forward a copy of your PTO policy to the address below:
yeattsm@chesterfield.gov
Thank you!  Mike Yeatts, SPHR  (804) 379-7765
title: Human Resource Manager
